name: test_e2e_with_logs[438_XPATH_BLIND_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XPATH_BLIND_001` |
| **Name** | XPath substring blind injection |
| **Category** | XPATH |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' or substring(//user[1]/password,1,1)='a' or '1'='2`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20or%20substring%28%2F%2Fuser%5B1%5D%2Fpassword%2C1%2C1%29%3D%27a%27%20or%20%271%27%3D%272`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~68000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:20:10.000 UTC

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XPath Injection] XPath injection attempt test_id=XPATH_BLIND_001-1772266810775-ork0u pattern_id=XPATH_BLIND_001 uri=/?q=%27%20or%20substring%28%2F%2Fuser%5B1%5D%2Fpassword%2C1%2C1%29%3D%27a%27%20or%20%271%27%3D%272 client=127.0.0.1` |
